page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN EAST WELLOW
page.content:
Many of the people in East Wellow are farm workers.This is because the area is mainly made up of farm land. There is little other local employment as it is difficult to get planning permission granted for factories or other businesses in this rural area.
There are two shops in the area but these of course just employ their owners and families. Other people in the area must go out to the nearby major towns of Salisbury,Southampton and Winchester and to such employers as IBM in Hursley and Plessey near Romsey.
There are some simple jobs like grass cutting but these are mainly part_time. There are a few self_employed people eg a blacksmith. There are also many retired people.
